verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to walk away from its meeting with President Donald Trump next month if the U.S. made a “ one - sided demand ” for the regime to surrender its nuclear weapons] .

North Korea threatened to walk away from its meeting with President Donald Trump next month if the U.S. made a “ one - sided demand ” for [ARG0: the regime] to [V: surrender] [ARG1: its nuclear weapons] .
